Step 3. Make a management plan 
• Call for help if you’re unsure.  A second opinion, from a more experienced medical officer or midwife is helpful
to obtain and document.
• Start Intrauterine fetal resuscitation:
o Intrauterine fetal resuscitation should be a specific response to a likely or diagnosed problem.
